name: Music_1600.wav
keywords: ['funk/rock', 'acoustic drums', 'e-guitar', 'e-bass', 'female voice singing', 'slow to medium tempo', 'background noises']
caption: An acoustic drum is playing a simple groove with a strong kick. The e-bass is playing on every hit of the kick together with an e-guitar  strumming a chord. A female voice is singing a slow paced melody. In the background you can hear some maschine sounds and piping sounds. This song may be playing in a James Bond movie-scene.
